message: Bob, I think a 60/40 split is fair for us to start. What do you think?
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, considering the inflation on your side.  Let's get this over with.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to meet you halfway, but anything less than 55 for me now is just not going to work because of the inflation. This is my final offer.
